blogPost.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com
blogPost.body: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com
blogPost.title: Polaris for Admin Figma UI kit - Shopify Polaris UI kit now available in Figma
blogPost.author: Dan Ross

localize.description: 我们的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包现在可以在图中找到。您可以通过可重用组件和最新的北极星指南、图标和调色板访问Figma中的完整套件。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件现已在图中提供

localize.description: 我們的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包現在可以在圖中找到。您可以通過可重用組件和最新的北極星指南、圖標和調色板訪問Figma中的完整套件。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件現已在圖中提供

previous.excerpt: Product Buffs equips teams with the skills and knowledge they need to build the best possible propositions through 5 weeks of hands-on product discovery coaching.
previous.title: Product Buffs - We help teams avoid building the wrong product

localize.description: Product Buffs通过5周的产品发现实践辅导，为团队提供建立最佳主张所需的技能和知识。
localize.tagline: 我们帮助团队避免构建错误的产品

localize.description: Product Buffs通過5周的產品發現實踐輔導，爲團隊提供建立最佳主張所需的技能和知識。
localize.tagline: 我們幫助團隊避免構建錯誤的產品

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 36 days in a row, now down over 52% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续36天下降，目前已从1月6日的高峰期下降了52%以上。🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續36天下降，目前已從1月6日的高峯期下降了52%以上。🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR。
